head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MORRIS, STANLEY A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MORRIS, STANLEY A.

block.p: MORRIS-Stanley A. On May 6, 2000. Husband of Corinne Morris (Nee Adelson). Father of Suzanne Abend, Jeffrey, Morris and Abbe Libby-Szablewski. Father-in-law of Jules Abend and Clifford Szablewski. Grandfather of Leslie Callahan, Jennifer Libby, Benjamin Szablewski, Megan Morris and Samatha Morris. Service and interment were held on May 9 at Beth Moses cemetery. For more information contact Sol Levinson & Bros., Inc., 1-800-338-1701
